title: ‘He Must Have Superpowers’: Asi Wind and His Sublime Card Tricks
description: With a new one-man show, deploying a single deck of cards, the performer’s 20-year run as magic’s best-kept secret may be nearing its end.
dc:creator: David Segal
category: Gym at Judson (Manhattan, NY, Performance Space)
media:credit: Calla Kessler for The New York Times
media:description: “Fame is not his goal,” David Blaine said of Asi Wind, above. “What interests him most is answering the question, ‘How can I make magic a great experience for my audience?’ That’s what he’s chasing.”
